title: Enhancing Learning Design Competencies: Synchronous Video Conferencing Pedagogy for Transitioning Medical Education Online

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational Medical Education Theory and In-Person Lecture Experience
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can effectively facilitate large-group online lectures using synchronous video conferencing tools.
Learners design strategies to improve learner engagement by over 30% through a real-time Q&A system.
Learners apply higher-order questioning techniques in online environments to elevate learner question complexity by at least two levels.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
